title: The Portrait of a Lady - phrase "in translations"

content.prompt: The phrase “in translations” (end of third sentence) provides an ironic effect because it

choices.label: states as fact what is actually the opposite of the truth
suggests that the narrator is unreliable as an authority
undermines the effect of a previous complimentary characterization
subtly reveals the narrator’s disgust with a social class

skill.text: Skill 3.D: Explain the function of contrasts within a text.
